page.title: 06PATHHEAD:SHOPS OF THE PAST
page.content:
PAST
AT THE BEGINNING OF THE 20th CENTURY THERE WERE 28 SHOPS IN THE VILLAGE OF PATHHEAD.THERE WERE 2 BUTCHERS,3 BAKERS,4 GROCERS,4 CLOTHIERS,1 SHOEMAKER,1 IRONMONGER,1 WATCHMAKER AND 1 CROCKERY MERCHANT.IN ADDITION THERE WERE 5 LICENSED PREMISES.A NUMBER OF LOCAL TRADESMEN WERE ALSO RESIDENT IN PATHHEAD.THESE WERE A JOINER,A BLACKSMITH,A PLUMBER,A MASON, A SLATER,A SADDLER,A MILLINER AND A DRESSMAKER.ALL THESE BUSINESSES WERE SITUATED IN PATHHEAD VILLAGE WHICH HAD AN APPROXIMATE POPULATION OF 400. PEOPLE CAME FROM ALL THE VILLAGES AROUND PATHHEAD FOR THEIR PROVISIONS.
